metadata.description: In the vein of the supernatural plane crash thriller TV show Lost! Bram Stoker-award winning writer Christopher Golden and novelist Tom Sniegoski join break-out new art talent Paul Azaceta to tell an innovative four issue mini-series. When Flight 654 goes down, it takes 148 souls with it. But not Nicholas Dane. How did the 34-year-old college professor survive - was it a miracle? Now Nicholas now finds that he has the memories and skills of one of the passengers from the flight - a boxer - and he's got to use them to survive!
metadata.name: Talent
